element.description: acronym or abriviation of the organisation

element.label: Parent Responsible Party
element.description: description of address hierarchies (i.e. adress of head office and division or departement)

element.name: che:CHE_CI_ResponsibleParty
element.label: Responsible party
element.description: identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organisations associated with the dataset

element.name: che:streetName
element.label: Streetname
element.description: Name of the street of the location

element.description: Street number of the location

element.description: Add on of the address (i.e. c/o)

element.name: che:postBox

element.description: telephone numbers for contacting the responsible individual or organisation

element.label: Legislation
element.description: Information about legal regulations

element.label: Legislation constraints
element.description: Information about the legal base of a constraint

element.label: Legal Constraints

element.name: che:legislationInformation
element.label: Legislation Information
element.description: provides information about legal regulations related to a resource

element.description: root entity which defines metadata about a resource or resources

element.name: che:projectType
element.label: Project type
element.description: Type of Initiative or project

element.name: che:revision
element.label: Revision
element.description: provides information about the last update and the scope of this update

element.label: Data Identification
element.description: information required to identify a dataset

element.help: Please fill in only in context of resource maintenance and NOT within metadata maintenance

element.name: che:historyConcept
element.label: History concept
element.description: Information about a history concept for Data and Metadata
element.help: According to the Federal law on Geoinformation a concept for data and metadata history has to be established

element.name: che:archiveConcept
element.label: Archive concept

element.help: according to the Federal law on Geoinformation a concept for data and metadata archives has to be established

element.label: History concept URL
element.description: If the history concept is available online, you can add an URL

element.label: History concept

element.name: che:CHE_MD_ArchiveConcept

element.label: Portrayal catalogue reference
element.description: information identifying the portrayal catalogue used

element.name: che:basicGeodataID
element.label: Basic geodata identifier
element.description: Identifier of the basic geodataset according the Annex I of the "Geoinformationsverordnung" or the "collection of basic geodata".
element.help: Please contact the geocat.ch-Team if you have any question

element.name: che:basicGeodataIDType
element.label: Basic geodata identifier type
element.description: indication if it is a federal, cantonal, communal or other basic geodataset
element.help: Please contact the geocat.ch-Team if you have any question

element.name: che:CHE_SV_ServiceIdentification
element.label: Service identification
element.description: description of services according the Swiss GM03_2+ profile of ISO 19119

element.name: che:CHE_MD_ImageDescription
element.label: Image description
element.description: information about an image's suitability for use

element.name: gmd:distance
element.label: Distance
element.description: ground sample distance. INTERLIS values for distance is defined as decimal between 0.00 and 9999999999.99.
element.condition: Provide a distance if no equivalent Scale is documented

element.name: gmd:Country
element.label: Country
element.description: Country in which the law was issued

element.name: gmd:MD_RestrictionCode
element.label: Restriction Code
element.description: Code indicating the type of restriction placed on useage of the data.

element.description: Indicates the tightness of the coupling between the service and the related resource.
